body: I would like to contribute with this one @mkouba

> I would like to contribute with this one @mkouba

@mcruzdev That would be awesome! Go ahead please...

A few pointers:
- Changes should be made in the Qute template in this module here: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/tree/main/devtools/config-doc-maven-plugin
- Output should be made similar to what we did earlier: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkusio.github.io/blob/main/_generated-doc/3.8/config/quarkus-agroal.adoc?plain=1#L13
Sorry, I will fix it myself as there's a good chance we will have to do a 3.15.1 emergency release and it might be a good idea to include it.

issue.title: Config Doc - Bring back the links for config sections and properties
